foreignData.name: Die Nebel umrühren
foreignData.text:
Bestimme ein Farbwort, sowie Die Nebel umrühren ins Spiel kommt.
Alle Vorkommen von Farbworten auf Zaubersprüchen und bleibenden Karten werden zu dem bestimmten Farbwort.

foreignData.name: Remolinear las nieblas
foreignData.text:
En cuanto Remolinear las nieblas entre en juego, elige una palabra de color.
Todas las referencias a palabras de color en hechizos o permanentes se convierten en la palabra de color elegida.

foreignData.name: Volute de brume
foreignData.text:
Au moment où la Volute de brume arrive en jeu, choisissez une couleur.
Toutes les occurrences de couleur sur les sorts et les permanents deviennent la couleur choisie.

foreignData.name: Agitare la Foschia
foreignData.text:
Mentre Agitare la Foschia entra in gioco, scegli il nome di un colore.
Tutte le parole che indicano un colore sulle magie e sui permanenti indicano invece il colore scelto.

foreignData.name: 渦巻く霧
foreignData.text:
渦巻く霧のが場に出るに際し、あなたは好きな色１色を選ぶ。
呪文やパーマネントに書かれているすべての「色を指定することば」は、あなたが選んだ色のことばになる。

foreignData.name: Turbilhonar as Névoas
foreignData.text:
Conforme Turbilhonar as Névoas entra em jogo, escolha um nome de cor.
Todos os nomes de cores em mágicas e permanentes tornam-se o nome de cor escolhido.

foreignData.name: 迷雾涡漩
foreignData.text:
于迷雾涡漩进场时，选择一个颜色文字。
所有咒语与永久物上的所有颜色文字均成为该颜色文字。

name: Swirl the Mists
originalText:
As Swirl the Mists comes into play, choose a color word.
All instances of color words on spells and permanents become the chosen color word.

rulings.text: This effect lasts as long as Swirl the Mists is on the battlefield. It ends as soon as Swirl the Mists leaves the battlefield.
Swirl the Mists’ ability also affects spells that are cast and permanents that enter the battlefield after Swirl the Mists enters the battlefield.

text:
As Swirl the Mists enters the battlefield, choose a color word.
All instances of color words in the text of spells and permanents are changed to the chosen color word.
